game.name: Pixel Clicker
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A pixel art-style clicker game where you tap to blast pixels and bosses, upgrade, automate, and travel through diverse biomes, from lush jungles to the far reaches of space, all wrapped in an immersive soundscape. Climb the leaderboard and become the ultimate pixel boss.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A pixel art-style clicker game where you tap to blast pixels and bosses, upgrade, automate, and travel through diverse biomes, from lush jungles to the far reaches of space, all wrapped in an immersive soundscape. Climb the leaderboard and become the ultimate pixel boss.
